txt.en: 'Hurry, now hurry! Bring them to me! Ah, thank you. Thank you. What a burden this has become. I will sadly have to pass along the increased cost of supply to my buyers, alas.'

'Bah! Just as I expected! I knew it was just a matter of time.'

The stranger glares at you and then lets out a breath, deflating.

'My apologies, I am only about to lose my entire supply of goods to cursed adventurers like you who are sure to come wandering by now that the roads are open. Say, I don't suppose you are looking for some coin?

'These roads used to be known to only a few, and I have used them for years to transport my goods across Belfalas. I had been using the nearby ruins as a way point, where I would stash goods, but now that it's overrun by worms, I cannot get near enough to retrieve them. If you go fetch my crates for me, I will make it worth your time. Just... hurry up before anyone else comes along, will you?'
You have managed to retrieve a great many of Balgam's stashed crates.\n\nYou should deliver them to him outside of Ost Amondal, in southern Belfalas.
